TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit BitmapEffect extends System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable
Public MustInherit Class BitmapEffect Inherits Animatable

summary.span: **注意：這個 API 現在已經淘汰。**

span.span: **Note: This API is now obsolete.**
The non-obsolete alternative is .
Defines a bitmap effect.

summary.span: 衍生的類別會定義可套用至 物件的效果，例如 或 。

span.span: Derived classes define effects that can be applied to a object, such as a or an .

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] 已軟體呈現點陣圖效果。 bitmap effects are software rendered. 套用效果的任何物件也會在軟體中轉譯。Any object that applies an effect will also be rendered in software. 不應該將點陣圖效果套用至大型的視覺效果或動畫，因為這可能會降低效能。Bitmap effects should not be applied to large visuals or animations, because this can degrade performance. > [!CAUTION] > 點陣圖效果不支援部分信任執行。Bitmap effects do not support partial trust execution. 應用程式必須有完全信任權限才能使用點陣圖效果。An application must have full trust permissions to use bitmap effects. 縮放轉換會先套用到視覺效果套用效果。Scale transforms are applied to a visual before an effect is applied. 發生非統一縮放轉換效果會使用較大的小數位數值。In the event of a non-uniform scale transform, the effect will use the larger of the scale values. 視覺化樹狀結構的更新如果將不會傳播筆刷的父鏈結。Updates to the visual tree of a will not propagate if a is in the brush's parent chain. 您可以強制效果的父物件上執行場景的更新來解決這項限制。You can work around this limitation by forcing an update of the scene on the parent object of the effect. 您可以呼叫或包含強制執行場景更新動畫。You can call or include an animation to force a scene update. 自訂效果會繼承這個類別來建立受管理的介面，以未受管理的效果。Custom effects inherit this class to create a managed interface to the unmanaged effect. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Unmanaged BitmapEffect](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms735092.aspx)應用程式開發介面。For more information, see the [Unmanaged BitmapEffect](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms735092.aspx) API.

span.span: for inheriting the class.
Associated enumerations:

para.span: 必須覆寫來初始化 managed 程式碼中未受管理的效果。

span.span: must be overridden to initialize an unmanaged effect in managed code.

para.span: 必須覆寫時未受管理的效果有使用者可以修改的屬性。

span.span: must be overridden when an unmanaged effect has properties that the user can modify.

para.span: 使用此方法搭配更新未受管理的內容。

span.span: Use this method in conjunction with to update your unmanaged properties.

summary.span: 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 (但可能無法再解析)，但不會複製動畫或它們目前的值。

span.span: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.

returns.span: 目前物件的可修改複本。

span.span: A modifiable clone of the current object.

summary.span: 建立對 [IMILBitmapEffect](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4bd5697d-bdde-4485-a05b-b3fea1403e16) 物件的控制代碼，可用來初始化自訂效果。

span.span: Creates a handle to an [IMILBitmapEffect](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4bd5697d-bdde-4485-a05b-b3fea1403e16) object that is used to initialize a custom effect.

returns.span: 對 [IMILBitmapEffect](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4bd5697d-bdde-4485-a05b-b3fea1403e16) 物件的控制代碼。

span.span: A handle to an [IMILBitmapEffect](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4bd5697d-bdde-4485-a05b-b3fea1403e16) object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Framework 自訂效果的互動透過處理[IMILBitmapEffect](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4bd5697d-bdde-4485-a05b-b3fea1403e16)物件。Framework interaction with custom effects is handled through an [IMILBitmapEffect](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4bd5697d-bdde-4485-a05b-b3fea1403e16) object. 外部的效果會使用透過自訂效果初始化方法。The outer effect is initialized with the custom effect through the method. ## Examples 下列範例示範實作使用方法來擷取包裝函式的動畫效果。The following example shows an implementation of that uses the method to retrieve a wrapper effect object. [!code-csharp[RGBFilterEffectAssembly_snip#CreateUnmanagedEffect](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RGBFilterEffectAssembly_snip/CSharp/RGBFilterBitmapEffect.cs#createunmanagedeffect)] [!code-vb[RGBFilterEffectAssembly_snip#CreateUnmanagedEffect](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/RGBFilterEffectAssembly_snip/visualbasic/rgbfilterbitmapeffect.vb#createunmanagedeffect)]
